channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Madagascar’s President Goes Into Hiding
item.description: The move followed weeks of intense and deadly protests against the government of President Andry Rajoelina, who himself came to power in a coup.

item.title: The Return of Israel’s Living Hostages From Gaza Signals a Time to Heal
item.description: With the releases, Israelis basked in a joyous moment of unifying national redemption after months of agonizing, polarizing war.

item.title: Ecuador: La reinvención andina de la cumbia

item.title: Gazans See Little to Celebrate Even Though the Bombs Have Stopped
item.description: The cease-fire in Gaza has taken hold. Hostages and prisoners have been exchanged. But amid the utter devastation of two years of war, a sense of gloo...

item.title: Ecuador: The Andean reinvention of cumbia
item.description: Photographers and storytellers Karla Gachet and Ivan Kashinsky document cumbia music in Colombia, Mexico, Ecuador, Peru, Argentina and the United Stat...

item.title: As the ceasefire begins, a look at the Gaza war by the numbers
item.description: With start of the Israel-Hamas ceasefire and release of hostages and prisoners, here are some key figures related to the Gaza war and the Hamas-led at...

item.title: Palestinians celebrate as prisoners are released by Israel under Gaza ceasefire deal
item.description: Among the 2,000 Palestinians freed in the Gaza ceasefire deal were 250 serving life terms for attacks on Israelis dating back decades.

item.title: New York Braces for Potential Flooding and Heavy Winds From Nor’easter
item.description: The storm has been moving up the East Coast since the weekend, dumping heavy rain and flooding roads on its way toward New England.

item.title: Dozens Are Dead and Dozens More Missing as Catastrophic Rains Devastate Mexico
item.description: Torrential rains set off deadly floods and landslides across five Mexican states, leaving a trail of destruction.

item.title: Tackles, projectiles and gunfire: Many fear ICE tactics are growing more violent

item.description: With the releases, Israelis basked in a joyous moment of unifying national redemption after months of agonizing, polarizing war.
